summary: A neurological pandemic has consumed the population. April, a secretive young girl, and Daniel, a man desperate and bereaved, come together on an isolated farm. When a mysterious stranger ... See full summary »
cast: Alton Milne|Sandra Louise Douglas|Vivienne Harvey|Robin Morris|Sharon Osdin|Max Adair|John Erskine|Samantha Mullaney|Phyllis Douglas|Mona Thomson|Moyra McWhirter|Peter Lochburn|Sharon MacLaughlan|Ralph Berger|Cheryl Easton|David Sibley|Paul McLellan|Scott Peden|Colin Sneddon|Nick Sneddon|Lynne Rhodie|Linda Dickie|Craig Woods|Paul Jamieson|John Surphlis|Alan Fawcus|Leo Horsfield|Christine Young|Craig Stitt|Ryan McHenry|James Miller|John Bruce
title: The Dead Outside
